com.cubeia.firebase.api.login
Interface LoginLocator

All Superinterfaces:
Contract
All Known Implementing Classes:
JDBCLoginService
public interface LoginLocator
extends Contract

Lookup the correct login handler for a login request. The login locator extends contract and is possible to mount as a service.

From Firebase 1.9 it will only be possible to mount a login locator as a service. And as such, the init(ServiceRegistry) method will be removed.

Author:
Fredrik

Method Summary
 void init(ServiceRegistry serviceRegistry)
          Deprecated. This method will be removed in Firebase 1.9
 LoginHandler locateLoginHandler(LoginRequestAction request)
           
 

Method Detail

init

@Deprecated
void init(ServiceRegistry serviceRegistry)
Deprecated. This method will be removed in Firebase 1.9

This method is called if the login locator is configured rather than mounted as a service. Since the service has access to the system it is recommended that service mounting is preferable.

NB:Please note that this method will not be called if the locator is mounted as a service.

NB 2:This method will be removed in Firebase 1.9

Parameters:
serviceRegistry - Service registry, never null

locateLoginHandler

LoginHandler locateLoginHandler(LoginRequestAction request)
